context.description: This wizard allows you to provide information for configuring generic J2EE runtime. In the Name field, specify the name that you want to assign to your generic J2EE runtime server. In the Location field, specify the directory where your J2EE libraries are located. You can either type the path of the directory or click Browse button to select it. Under JRE list, select a JRE to compile against. For example, Workbench default JRE. You can either select the appropriate value from the JRE list or click Installed JRE to define a new JRE configuration.
